scripts.setup: npm install && npm run install:server && npm run install:client
scripts.lint: npm run lint:client && npm run lint:server
scripts.start:dev: concurrently -n Server,Client --kill-others-on-fail " npm run server:dev" " npm run client"
scripts.clean-install: rimraf node_modules/ && rimraf server/node_modules/ && rimraf client/node_modules/ && npm install && cd server && npm install && cd .. && cd client && npm install && cd ..
